item.description: Automobile Fire; INC#0548; 10:12AM; 500 N Quay Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FxdATY; Wilmington; 3 big rigs are well involved in fire within an auto yard. No structures are threatened at this time. No additional resources are anticipated to be needed. Firefighters are making an offensive fire attack and working to prevent exposure to any additional vehicles. No injuries reported.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E248 E38 E48 E49 T48 RA101; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1220; 07:16PM; 1958 W Florence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JkDlsW; Manchester Square; KNOCKDOWN: Firefighters faced forcible entry challenges gaining access inside the structure, which prompted a request for additional resources. Once they made entry, they were able to quickly locate the seat of the fire and 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was prevented from extending into the attic of the stand alone building. The restaurant was closed at the time and the cause/$ loss is TBD. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 E266 E294 E33 E46 E94 RA246 T66 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1220; 06:52PM; 1958 W Florence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JkDlsW; Manchester Square; One story, 50' x 50' commercial building (DBA Woody BBQ) with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 E266 E33 E94 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0536; 10:16AM; 1442 N Formosa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pu6cU5; Hollywood; The first arriving fire companies quickly extinguished fire in one unit on the first floor of a two story, 8-plex apartment building with fire in one unit on the first floor. Firefighters contained it to the unit of origin, preventing any extensive to above or adjacent units. Despite initial reports of someone in the unit, both the primary and secondary search found no occupants. There are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 10:02AM. No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E261 E82 RA82 RA827 T27 T61; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0331; 06:54AM; 254 W Gage Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H6d67G; Florence; KNOCKDOWN: 23 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. No other structures were damaged. No further details.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E266 E57 RA257 RA833 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0331; 06:42AM; 300 W 63rd Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jSmq4J; Florence; One story, L-shaped commercial building (vacant, previous burn) with fire and smoke showing. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. ; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E266 E57 RA257 RA833 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0265; 05:35AM; 657 N Newton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qpDXoH; San Fernando; LAFD arrived to find San Fernando Police assisting occupants with evacuation of the one-story home with fire in the attic. Firefighters began by deploying plastic covers over belongings below the fire (salvage operations) to protects from the water deployed in the attic above, while crews positioned themselves on the roof awaiting coordination from fire attack teams inside. After salvage, crews simultaneously created openings from above and below to access the burning attic. Ultimately, it took 22 firefighters 37 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC12 E287 E289 E7 E75 E77 E98 RA98 T87 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0265; 04:58AM; 657 N Newton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qpDXoH; San Fernando; One-story single-family home with fire in the attic. Offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC12 E287 E289 E7 E75 E77 E98 RA98 T87 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1608; 09:18PM; 1753 W Florence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qnZspT; Harvard Park; It took 28 firefighters 19 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames on the second floor of the two-story commercial structure. No reported injuries. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E34 E66 RA266 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1608; 08:59PM; 1753 W Florence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qnZspT; Harvard Park; Two-story vacant commercial building (site of previous burn) with moderate smoke showing from the second floor.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E34 E66 RA266 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange
